title: Herbal Heart-Healthy Tea (Arjuna + Hibiscus)
excerpt: A cooling cardiovascular-support tea combining Arjuna bark with hibiscus and rosehip for antioxidant and circulatory support.
content:
## What Is This Heart-Healthy Tea?
A carefully balanced tea blend featuring Terminalia arjuna (arjuna), hibiscus flowers, and rosehip to support cardiovascular wellness as part of a healthy lifestyle.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Arjuna is a classical herb associated with cardiac support and stamina; hibiscus is cooling and supports healthy blood pressure and antioxidant protection.

### Key Benefits
- Supports healthy circulation and cardiovascular resilience.
- Antioxidant support from hibiscus and rosehip.
- Cooling effect beneficial for Pitta tendencies.

## Ingredients
- Arjuna bark (sliced or powdered)
- Hibiscus petals
- Rosehip

## Usage Instructions
- Steep one tea sachet in hot water for 5–8 minutes. Consume 1–2 cups daily; monitor with your healthcare provider if you have known cardiac conditions or are on heart medications.

## Packaging
- Compostable tea sachets in a labeled box with monitoring advice.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult your cardiologist or healthcare provider if you have hypertension, are on blood-pressure medications, or have heart disease. Do not replace prescribed medications without medical advice.

## Why Choose This Tea?
A gentle, classical herbal approach to daily cardiovascular support—best used as part of an integrative lifestyle plan.
